Reason: The configuration 'snapshot_links_per_second' is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts system performance by throttling the creation or clearing of snapshot links to prevent negative performance impact on consumer grade SSDs. The 'getSnapshotRateLimiter' method uses the value obtained from 'getSnapshotLinksPerSecond' method, which in turn retrieves the value from 'DatabaseDescriptor.getSnapshotLinksPerSecond'. This configuration involves time-expensive operations to control the rate at which snapshot links are processed, leading to notable performance variations at the system level.
